data.title: Start Nuxt and came back
data.text: I am the last of the posts, ask questions

data.title: Homepage will be ready soon
data.text: There is still a little bit of work left to do on the block with the car model, but the main work is almost finished. In the future, I will only make small, professional edits.

data.title: ThreeJS model ready
data.text: Thats was hard, but trully interesting. But I temporarily disabled the display of the ThreeJS model

data.title: Redesign Blog and Library
data.text: Added navigation buttons to the Blog page, completely changed the look of the Library page. Of course, this is not the final look of the pages and the site as a whole

data.title: Full redesign of the site
data.text: Change the color scheme, add new pages, change the layout of the existing pages. Now the site has a more modern and clean look.

data.title: Design system is ready
data.text: I finally finished the design system. Now I can start working on the site. I will add new pages and features to the site, but the main structure is ready. I hope you like it!

data.title: Library page updated
data.text: The mobile version doesn't have a clear design yet, and I'll probably add more details

data.title: Start Nuxt and not came back
data.text: Finally I did it and switched to Nuxt. It was a bit painful, but I understood that this transition was necessary for further growth and optimization. Now SEO will work perfectly and full-fledged routing will appear

data.title: Whats next hah?
data.text: Now I am refactoring the terminal and improving its functionality. I am also creating pages for projects, posts and reviews. And of course, I am wondering if I should refactor the UI again.

data.title: Got new Job with NextJS
data.text: New path with React ecosystem. That will be interesting!
